mapper.select: select pg.id, pg.name, pg.id1, pg.id2, pg.id3, pg.id4, pg.active, 'PG' source from plot_group pg where pg.id = #{parm1} union select x.id, x.name, trts.level_tag_id id1, trts.temp_tag_id id2 , trtd.level_tag_id id3, trtd.temp_tag_id id4, 'Y' active, 'X' source from transfer x left outer join tank_ref_tag_vw trts on x.source_id=trts.id left outer join tank_ref_tag_vw trtd on x.destination_id = trtd.id where x.status_id = 1 and x.id = #{parm1}

select pg.id, pg.name, pg.id1, pg.id2, pg.id3, pg.id4, pg.active, 'PG' source from plot_group pg union select x.id, x.name, if(ts.tag_type_code = 'TK',source_id,null) , if(td.tag_type_code='TK',destination_id,null), null, null, 'Y', 'X' from transfer x join tag ts on x.source_id=ts.id join tag td on x.destination_id = td.id join transfer_status_vw tsv on tsv.id = x.status_id where tsv.code = 'A' order by 2
mapper.insert: insert into plot_group ( name, id1, id2, id3, id4 ) values( #{name}, #{id1}, #{id2}, #{id3}, #{id4} )
